arts.ttl: Peter Crouch tells Enzo Maresca he has to drop Chelsea star after Conference League win
arts.sum: Chelsea earned a 2-0 win over Heidenheim in the Europa Conference League and Peter Crouch believes Filip Jorgensen should now keep his place in goal for the west London side

arts.ttl: Heidenheim 0-2 Chelsea: Nkunku sets new club European record in Conference League win
arts.sum: Chelsea's Christopher Nkunku sets a new club European goalscoring record courtesy of his goal in the 2-0 win over Heidenheim in the Conference League.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca urges Chelsea's fringe players to 'be ready' to contribute during their intense December schedule as he vows to give his side's Conference League stars more chances
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca promised more game time for his second-string stars as the fixture schedule intensifies, following a hard-fought 2-0 Conference League win against Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Maresca hails ‘very important’ Sancho after Chelsea win
arts.sum: Chelsea reaction. The post Maresca hails ‘very important’ Sancho after Chelsea win appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca promises more chances for Chelsea fringe players in busy schedule
arts.sum: The Blues were 2-0 winners over Heidenheim in the Conference League.

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans send message to Manchester United after Jadon Sancho’s display against Heidenheim
arts.sum: Chelsea secured a fourth consecutive victory in the Europa Conference League as they ran out 2-0 winners over Heidenheim on Thursday night. The Blues triumphed...

arts.ttl: Heidenheim 0-2 Chelsea: Match report and talking points as Jorgensen delivers statement performance
arts.sum: Match report and key talking points from Chelsea's UEFA Conference League win over Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Conference League roundup: Mykhailo Mudryk fires Chelsea past Heidenheim
arts.sum: Christopher Nkunku also on target in 2-0 win Hearts lose out in Belgium, TNS beaten at home Chelsea moved to within one win of the Conference League last 16 with a 2-0 victory away to Heidenheim to maintain their perfect start in the competition. Christopher Nkunku and Mykhailo Mudryk scored the goals in the second half, Jadon Sancho’s cut-back shortly after the interval finding the France international who fired in his 11th of the season, then Mudryk finished things late on with a lovely finish into the top corner. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Chelsea close in on Conference League knockout stages with victory over Heidenheim
arts.sum: Heidenheim 0-2 Chelsea: Christopher Nkunku and Mykhailo Mudryk scored the goals in Germany to leave Enzo Maresca’s side a win away from progressing

arts.ttl: Heidenheim 0-2 Chelsea: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Blues continue perfect Conference League campaign
arts.sum: Chelsea continue flawless Conference League campaign with hard-fought 2-0 win over Heidenheim, thanks to goals from Christopher Nkunku and Mykhaylo Mudryk.
